channel.title: [PI] [exion] help ! error ! need help!
channel.description:
Hello,
The server im using has an error, What happens is when the player or players log out it keeps them logged in and doesnt allow them to log in again inless they restart their computer or i restart the server any1 know why? im going to post a picture
but i need help please? - need a fix asap please pictures,
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/10gkaie.jpg[/img]
